statements: SELECT * FROM PesticideUsage
SELECT id, pesticide_name, application_date FROM PesticideUsage
SELECT * FROM PesticideUsage WHERE application_area > 10
SELECT pesticide_name, impact_assessment FROM PesticideUsage WHERE application_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM PesticideUsage ORDER BY application_date DESC
SELECT * FROM PesticideUsage ORDER BY application_date DESC, application_area
SELECT id, pesticide_name, application_date FROM PesticideUsage WHERE impact_assessment LIKE '%high%'
SELECT DISTINCT pesticide_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM PesticideUsage GROUP BY pesticide_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY count DESC
SELECT id, pesticide_name, application_area FROM PesticideUsage WHERE application_area > 50 ORDER BY id LIMIT 3
SELECT AVG(application_area) as avg_area, MAX(application_area) as max_area, MIN(application_area) as min_area FROM PesticideUsage
SELECT * FROM PesticideUsage
SELECT pesticide_name, application_date FROM PesticideUsage ORDER BY application_date DESC
SELECT area_name, total_acres FROM AgriculturalAreas WHERE total_acres > 100
SELECT area_name, location, soil_type FROM AgriculturalAreas WHERE location LIKE 'Farm%'
SELECT id, pesticide_name, application_area FROM PesticideUsage WHERE environmental_impact = 'Low'
SELECT pesticide_name, application_date, application_area FROM PesticideUsage WHERE application_area > 100 ORDER BY application_date DESC
SELECT area_name, total_acres, location FROM AgriculturalAreas WHERE soil_type = 'Clay' ORDER BY total_acres DESC
SELECT * FROM PesticideUsage INNER JOIN AgriculturalAreas ON PesticideUsage.application_area = AgriculturalAreas.total_acres
SELECT pesticide_name, application_area, environmental_impact FROM PesticideUsage WHERE environmental_impact IS NOT NULL ORDER BY pesticide_name ASC
SELECT area_name AS 'Area Name', total_acres AS 'Total Acres', location AS 'Location' FROM AgriculturalAreas WHERE total_acres BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM Pesticide_Usage WHERE quantity_used > 50
SELECT pesticide_name, usage_date FROM Pesticide_Usage ORDER BY usage_date DESC
SELECT area_name, location_coordinates FROM Agricultural_Areas WHERE crop_type = 'Corn'
SELECT impact_type, impact_description FROM Pesticide_Impact WHERE impact_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT id, pesticide_name, quantity_used, area_covered FROM Pesticide_Usage WHERE id = 5
SELECT * FROM Pesticide_Usage ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT pesticide_name, quantity_used FROM Pesticide_Usage WHERE quantity_used > 100 ORDER BY pesticide_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT impact_type FROM Pesticide_Impact WHERE impact_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT area_name, crop_type FROM Agricultural_Areas WHERE soil_type = 'Clay' AND crop_type = 'Rice' ORDER BY area_name;
SELECT * FROM Pesticide_Usage JOIN Pesticide_Impact ON Pesticide_Usage.id = Pesticide_Impact.pesticide_id WHERE Pesticide_Impact.impact_type = 'Environmental';
SELECT * FROM pesticide_inventory ORDER BY pesticide_name ASC;
SELECT pesticide_name, quantity FROM pesticide_inventory WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT manufacturer, expiration_date FROM pesticide_inventory WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT application_date, application_area FROM application_records ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT field_name, crop_type FROM field_locations WHERE crop_type = 'Corn';
SELECT * FROM pesticide_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT pesticide_name, manufacturer, expiration_date FROM pesticide_inventory WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' AND manufacturer = 'ABC Inc.'
SELECT * FROM application_records ar JOIN pesticide_inventory pi ON ar.pesticide_id = pi.pesticide_id WHERE ar.application_area > 50
SELECT field_name, crop_type, latitude, longitude FROM field_locations WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' ORDER BY latitude ASC, longitude DESC
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact WHERE impact_type = 'Water Pollution' AND impact_level > 3
SELECT * FROM pesticides;
SELECT name, toxicity_level FROM pesticides WHERE toxicity_level > 3;
SELECT area_name, location, size_acres FROM agricultural_areas ORDER BY size_acres DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM pesticides GROUP BY manufacturer;
SELECT e.impact_type, er.report_date FROM environmental_impact e INNER JOIN assessment_reports er ON e.id = er.impact_id;
SELECT * FROM pesticides ORDER BY name DESC, toxicity_level ASC;
SELECT area_name, size_acres, soil_type FROM agricultural_areas WHERE size_acres > 50 ORDER BY size_acres DESC;

SELECT p.name, a.area_name, pa.application_date FROM pesticides p JOIN pesticide_applications pa ON p.id = pa.pesticide_id JOIN agricultural_areas a ON pa.area_id = a.id WHERE pa.application_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY pa.application_date ASC;
SELECT e.impact_type, e.impact_description, ar.report_text FROM environmental_impact e JOIN assessment_reports ar ON e.id = ar.impact_id WHERE e.impact_type = 'Water Pollution';

SELECT a.area_name, COUNT(pa.id) AS total_applications, AVG(pa.application_amount) AS avg_amount FROM agricultural_areas a LEFT JOIN pesticide_applications pa ON a.id = pa.area_id GROUP BY a.area_name HAVING AVG(pa.application_amount) > 50;
